website_summaries.verdict: Runners have appreciated the cushioning quality of the Nike Revolution 5. This road running shoe utilizes a soft midsole foam that offers a bouncy and responsive running experience. Although some consumers complained about the shoe’s durability, others still recommended this neutral running shoe for its breathability and lightweight construction.
pros: Nike Revolution 5 is a perfect jogging and walking companion, according to many wearers
People like the lightweight construction of this road running shoe
The shoe is stylish and comfortable based on some reviews
A lot of runners welcome the light and breathable upper of the Nike Revolution 5
Many purchasers commented that the shoe offers excellent cushioning
This running shoe has ample room in the forefoot section that allows for natural foot movements, several consumers noted
Nike Revolution 5 offers additional support in the heel area, said a few reviewers
Consumers are happy that the price of this running shoe is affordable
cons: The durability of the upper unit is questionable to some buyers
One reviewer mentioned that the shoe insole is not removable

customer_reviews.title: Very happy customer. Recomend amazon
customer_reviews.text: Not only did i get my shoes on time, good quality and to fit me perfectly and also be comfortable i also orderd my mum a birthday present and it said june 4th so days after mum's birthday but that was my fault as i orderd late i hold my hands up for that. But to my luck it was orderd today in time for my mums birthday so orderd in less then 24hours. Im sooo happy with amazon very happy y customer will buy again :)
customer_reviews.author: Griogair Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: As long as you trade up half a size you’ll be fine. My husband is usually a 10.5 so after reading previous reviews I ordered an 11 for his birthday and it fits perfectly. Other than that the trainers are fantastic value for money, great quality and super comfortable and light. He doesn’t run any more but we walked all round York the whole weekend and normally new shoes would need breaking in but these were fantastic and supported his feet perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: DJ LYONS

customer_reviews.title: Fab.
customer_reviews.text: Trainers were true to picture at a good price. They were delivered promptly and am reliably informed by son are comfortable, what’s not to like. The grey was also lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa King

customer_reviews.title: Don’t look like regular Nike shoes. Will try and review again
customer_reviews.text: Running trainers arrived in broken/used boxed. As soon as I took them out, the right one is missing the stuff inside and the sole looks like it’s been worn outside. The left one looks new. They fit slightly big, despite always using UK Size 9 this pair feels and looks more like 9.5.
customer_reviews.author: RAUL PREMIO-PEREZ

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but wrong size came
customer_reviews.text: Thick sole, quite comfy. Top is kinda thin, but makes it breathable. Ordered a size 12, but I got 11.5. Still fits. 1 thing I don't like is the left is a bit painful, but that's my flat foot 😂
customer_reviews.author: Michael Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Good trainer
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son, came quickly and he loves them, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: S Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointing buy
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my father, dissapointed really only bought these in July issues with shoes already fabric and material has a fault and sadly unable to return as only allowed to return after one month
customer_reviews.author: still havent recieved product

customer_reviews.title: Avoid at all costs of you like dry feet
customer_reviews.text: Suitable for walking indoors or dry weather. Even if it's not raining but they're only puddles on the floor, your feet will get, and I very much mean this, soaking wet. They're less waterproof than slippers
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers
customer_reviews.text: My son likes these trainers so much that we bought a second pair. Comfy and practical, as well as looking good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Really lovely people to deal with. Amazon got the delivery wrong but this business sorted collection and refund immediately. Well recommended! The trainers that did arrive were excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Probably knock-offs
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality and they squeak. My guess is that these are not real Nike runners but a cheap knock-off posing as the authentic version.
customer_reviews.author: Nelo

customer_reviews.title: Loud squeak.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and look great, but both shoes had a loud squeak, that would not go away, it was driving me nuts, I had to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: maxyb

customer_reviews.title: Nice trainers
customer_reviews.text: Nice trainers, great for the gym. Usual bike good quality
customer_reviews.author: Adam Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Loud clicking sound when walking.
customer_reviews.text: REALLY loud clicking sound when walking. I sounded like a horse galloping down the road. I’m a teacher and my students were laughing hysterically when I wore these to work one day after receiving them. NOTE: Before buying, I read another review saying they had a loud click but chose not to listen. Don’t take the chance people.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Cawley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Just restarted running after many unfit years and was looking for a good pair of trainers to wear. Chose these as they are a brand I used to wear and didn't want to spend silly money not knowing if I would keep up with the running. The trainers fit well and very light and comfortable to wear and so far I'm very happy with them. As and when the time comes I will buy them again
customer_reviews.author: Flinty

customer_reviews.title: Front bit too shallow
customer_reviews.text: The front bit of the shoes is so shallow that your thumb sticks out!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. H

customer_reviews.title: Another pair that click loudly when walking
customer_reviews.text: These look good, and being Nike i expected them to be spot on for wearing to work and light dog walking. Problem is along with others that they make a loud clicking noise on every surface you walk on, be it carpets, lino, grass and pavements.Even my dog looks at me funnier than normal, i wish i had read the other reviews before buying, but i have arranged to send them back to get a refund, so not a complete disaster.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Troup

customer_reviews.title: Value for money but could be better
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look good, but are not as well made for running as I was expecting them to be. Could have been a big more comfortable than they are.
customer_reviews.author: Furqan Shahid

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a relative
customer_reviews.text: I personally can only say that these trainers looked good and appeared to be very well made, they were bought for a relative who assures me that they are very pleased with the look and the quality.
customer_reviews.author: P. Mellor

customer_reviews.title: To squeak or not to squeak
customer_reviews.text: This trainer would have been ideal if didn’t start to squeak/click in the right trainer. Didn’t happen at first and I saw the reviews that mentioned the defect and thought I’d got away with it. After a week, it began. And it’s pretty embarrassing, the Mrs was poking fun at me whilst I squeaked along on a day out. Didn’t matter what surface I was on. They went back none the less.
customer_reviews.author: Danimal Rocks

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but dont go trying a marathon in them
customer_reviews.text: Fit is perfect as per Nike sizes, the 10.5UK fits exactly the same as Nike 10.5UK in other Nike trainers. Comfortable for gym use and light running. But you do notice the quality difference between these and more expensive Nike trainers if you try to run more than 5km at once in them. The cushioning wouldnt be as high quality. Also, the soles take wear more quickly than more expensive Nike, some of the black grip is already starting to peel away from the white sole after 6 weeks of wear. I got these for GBP35 so for that price I'm happy, but probably wouldnt pay more for this model.
customer_reviews.author: Ed O

customer_reviews.title: Revolution 5 cheaper than 4
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a replacement pair of revolution 4 but these were much cheaper. While a different style they are equally as comfy. Dont like white soles so these look great to me.
customer_reviews.author: John healy

customer_reviews.title: Too uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've never owned a supposed running shoe before and I found them disappointing and uncomfortable. They hurt across the top of my foot, even though they're a half-size larger than I ordered and after widening the laces. I gave them a go but I feel like they're restricting my blood supply after a while. Later I slipped on an old, manky pair of Nike Challengers from 10 years ago and found those to be a much softer and lighter shoe. I don't like the feeling of the Revolution 5 at all.. Very chunky material and too rigid. They're not like I thought they would be at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lee R

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant so breathable, comfy and light....
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant trainers so far I’ve bought the black, light blue and intend on getting others. Even bought my dad a pair. I’ve heard negative comments but the trainers are excellent. This comes from someone who has over 20 pairs of trainers!
customer_reviews.author: John Slater

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and comfortable. I bought these for my son and he loves them. So much so, we have bought another, waterproof pair for school PE.
customer_reviews.author: sarah c.

customer_reviews.title: Great supportive fit
customer_reviews.text: Great fit very comfortable, broke my foot a few months ago nike revolutions5 are so comfortable with a great supportive it
customer_reviews.author: CrashBandicoot

customer_reviews.title: Slightly firmer than the previous Revolutions
customer_reviews.text: The previous Revolution versions have all fitted well, though the plastic in their heels has tended to shatter and dig into me. These new ones seem differently designed so hopefully they’ll stay wearable.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Ridd

customer_reviews.title: Dissaponting Trainers
customer_reviews.text: initially I wrote a review about these trainers / running shoes and then withdrew it as I believed I hadn"t really given it a fair go, in terms of duration. Following on from the extension please see my review below. In my personal opinion I would not recommend the purchase of these items. they have frustratingly squeeked when walking from day one. If I had wanted to buy clown shoes I would have approach the local circus. Dissapointed with these shoes. please remember this is my personal opinion based purely on my experience of this product
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday trainer
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for everyday use. Robust. Wear well. Look good. Really comfortable (as Nike always seems to be for me).
customer_reviews.author: AB of Bristol

customer_reviews.title: Strange sizing.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son who had same pair in junior sizes which fitted like a glove. The sizing on this one doesn't make any sense at all and they seem quite narrow. I had to buy nearly 2 sizes larger than other shoe sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of trainers
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit and very comfortable right out of the box. No 'breaking in' was needed whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Hermione Little

customer_reviews.title: Just the job
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son he loves them and he’s not the easiest to please 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: lorraine shipley

customer_reviews.title: Squeak, Squeak, Sqeak
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was me initially but the shoes squeak after 20 mins of wearing them. Something to do with how they’ve designed the sole. A lot of other people have apparently experienced the same issue. Nike customer service also shrugged their shoulders at it. Won’t recommend!
customer_reviews.author: redbulltasting

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: From purchase the shoe had some serious "clicking" noise when walking on numerous different types of surfaces.... Shoe has been worn about 15-20 times now the metal on the heel has been exposed. Really disappointed considering this is supposed to be a nike product. Still waiting to hear back from the seller. Seems a few people below mentioned the clicking noise - this should be listed as its clearly an on-going issue with the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Far too small
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of Nike running shoes that I have tried. I don't know what measurement system Nike use, but both pairs were far too small and had to be returned. I'll try another brand in future.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Looks fine but for regular wear these are not the shoes you are looking for
customer_reviews.text: I was initially pretty happy with these for the price point I paid but after a few months light use they are falling apart on the bottom so I would say avoid and pay a little more for something more robust
customer_reviews.author: DavidNM

customer_reviews.title: Fab product
customer_reviews.text: Fab quick delivery, shoe firs as expected this is second pair for my son as he loves the comfort and fit , just hes grown so needed another pair. Sizes are exactly what he is .
customer_reviews.author: sharonlimmer

customer_reviews.title: Knock off?
customer_reviews.text: Extremely ill fitting shoes, especially in the heel. This must be a fake "knock off" product as I have a pair of flyease (very similar shoe) that are very comfortable I was simply looking for a tighter fit
customer_reviews.author: Jason Carrier

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if genuine
customer_reviews.text: This product came in a brown blank box with minimal packaging with no nike stuff inside. The shoes are slightly different in shape as one is more round so not too confident these are genuine.
customer_reviews.author: Harley Gaskin

customer_reviews.title: Trainers look and feel fine but I have the clicking noise!
customer_reviews.text: The trainers look and feel fine and are pretty comfortable. Straight out of the box I got the clicking noise whilst walking. Thought it may disappear as they are worn in but it still comes back randomly. The noise is loud and distracting. Comfort wise fine for 5-10km walk/runs or less. Disappointing as otherwise they would be great entry level fitness shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Jauncey

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely brilliant for everyday, lifestyle use, and gym, however, depending upon the type of workout, as they do not have the flyknit upper, which os not a bad thing, but for the longer, or only cardio activities, nike epic react would be a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value, comfortable and look smart. My son has them for PE he’s quite happy
customer_reviews.author: sp

customer_reviews.title: Nice trainers, comfortable, good price
customer_reviews.text: Got these for working out and runs of up to 5 miles. Happy with them, they're light and comfortable and great VFM
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t order a click trainer.
customer_reviews.text: Read the other reviews. I had to send the first pair back as one shoe had a clicking sound when you walked. Very irritating. Have the new ones now so will see if they have the same issue. Update... second pair returned now with the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy !! Bought trainers and wore once both soles squeaking every step ! sent back to seller straight away , as where faulty or not genuine. The seller now says I can not get refund as I wore them once outside before returning them straight away !!! Terrible customer service and a con !
customer_reviews.author: william m duncan

customer_reviews.title: Too damned small
customer_reviews.text: To small and hard as a brick. V disappointed. Need at least a half size bigger. Squashing the he'll out of my left big toe. Sizing guide useless. Can't get the colour i want in a larger size. Gutted!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Strabane Mike

customer_reviews.title: Colours great
customer_reviews.text: Came within 3 days ..drivers are great leave in a safe place love the trainers hope my partner will at Christmas..thanks keep safe you all...Tricia Griffiths.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia G.

customer_reviews.title: Nike Trainer
customer_reviews.text: The trainer is light, comfortable and an excellent fit. Delivered promptly, received 4 days of ordering.
customer_reviews.author: spw

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: Average product. Bought for bar work but there are better out there. Value for money if you’re not willing to invest more
customer_reviews.author: Nick OH

customer_reviews.title: Okay but not great for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought some Sketchers at the same time for around the same price and they are far more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: iant

customer_reviews.title: Nice stylish trainers.
customer_reviews.text: Nice lightweight trainer. Perfect for exercise, running etc. Great price considering the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes with great grip
customer_reviews.text: I have used these shoes for running and outdoor basketball and they have proven to be very comfortable with more than sufficient grip and good support.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Do you like blisters
customer_reviews.text: The most uncomfortable trainers, horrible to walk in , both ankles had blisters in 3 minuets
customer_reviews.author: steven crane

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic and very comfortable also very light,excellent for running. I recommend this this NIKE trainers
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Hurt toes an squeaky noises
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews about it being tight on the toes an making squeaking noises when you walk, I didn’t think it would be that bad but it’s worse, I thought I could break them in but it’s not happening. My feet are killing me, I think it’s best to stick to saucony.
customer_reviews.author: Bilal

customer_reviews.title: The clicking sole..... had to return
customer_reviews.text: Had to return these sadly. Looked a great trainer but they click when walking and running. There is a groove in the sole which was causing the problem. Seemed to be a design fault.
customer_reviews.author: Garry B

customer_reviews.title: Comfiest trainers ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I have bought.The best trainers ever.So comfortable.Dont know they are on your feet.
customer_reviews.author: pattie

customer_reviews.title: For the price - great
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect. Nice for a run. Could be a tiny tiny bit more supportive but for the price you really can’t complain.
customer_reviews.author: david best

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: They look really good and are really comfortable but for some reason the trainers squeak all the time it’s so bad I can’t wear them
customer_reviews.author: Nick Ridley

customer_reviews.title: Good for casual but running can be difficult
customer_reviews.text: Good, cheap and comfortable, although not great for running; especially long distance. Can rub if you already have blisters although they haven't caused any themselves. Excellent grip as well. Would recommend if you just need some casual shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Patmyson

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and style
customer_reviews.text: Bought for general use and they look and Greek good.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. J. Corcoran

customer_reviews.title: Possibly fake or just not well manufactured
customer_reviews.text: They look great, however both trainers click and squeak when I walk, really loudly and it’s very embarrassing. Probably fake but ok for using around the house or garden.
customer_reviews.author: Ollie Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It has excellent quality and it is very comfortable. The only problem is that the price is expensive.
customer_reviews.author: dinksew

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect trainers that are comfortable and good for running plus the product arrived as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ephraim Maimbo

customer_reviews.title: Loud clicking! Beware
customer_reviews.text: After only a few times of wearing there is a loud clicking noise in one of the shoes, so much so they are no longer wearable. Very disappointed as bought this as a gift for my husband. Great look, poor quality!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: They squeek when I walk in them they are annoying
customer_reviews.author: Mike e.

customer_reviews.title: Look good. Feel good.
customer_reviews.text: These are not bad kicks. They aren't premium but for the price - very useable!
customer_reviews.author: john k.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes for beginner runners
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable tuning shoes, using it instead of a standard trainer has already improved my running times and i.proved my running form.
customer_reviews.author: Aishwarya

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the shoe and fit was perfect. Really comfy and look as seen on the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, a bit loud
customer_reviews.text: They smack the ground kind of loudly, but I've only had them for a day. Otherwise great shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Murray

customer_reviews.title: Two pairs of faulty shoes
customer_reviews.text: Would avoid buying - bought this shoe and left shoe started squeaking as the sole was faulty after a week and the replacement did the same in a week, again issue with the left shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good trainer
customer_reviews.text: Ideal, good for the day to day use I wanted them for, good quality and fit
customer_reviews.author: Oggi Batty

customer_reviews.title: Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Hello sir I Want to inform you about shoes My husband’s cousin fitted same shoes now no need to refund shoes Thankyou
customer_reviews.author: Mandeep

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't believe for a second that what arrived was a Nike product. Clearly these are cheap knock offs??????
customer_reviews.author: Mark McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Nice trainers, they look good and have a quality feel.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good. Fits well. I am happy with that product.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: 5star.
customer_reviews.text: Wouldnt say they are for running as would a proper runners shoe from atetic shop...BUT..... for doing circuit HiiT session training , they are fab and more than do the job, or just for general use.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Dunn

customer_reviews.title: They squeak......lots!
customer_reviews.text: They squeak when you walk. It’s embarrassing. Whilst try look nice, you can’t wear them in the presence of other people! Seems a common complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. David Green

customer_reviews.title: 5star.
customer_reviews.text: Not a runners shoe from some1 who has done half marathons in the past, but fantastic for doing HiiT sessions and other kp fit in.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed to receive  item with a visible mark. I am supposed to give this as a gift.
customer_reviews.text: It has a visible imperfection or stain on one shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Revolution 5 Running Shoe
product_meta.description: The Nike Revolution 5 cushions your steps with soft foam for maximum comfort when running. The light knitted fabric wraps the foot with breathable comfort. Reinforced heel and external details offer support and resistance. The soft foam midsole ensures a feeling of smoothness and stability. The structured outer wall reduces the weight of the shoe. The durable and flexible rubber sole offers lasting traction on a variety of surfaces.
